definition: the act of predicting (as by reasoning about the future)
details:
noun
- the act of predicting (as by reasoning about the future)
= synonyms: prediction
- something expected (as on the basis of a norm)
= example: something expected (as on the basis of a norm)
= synonyms: expectancy
- an expectation
= synonyms: expectancy
- anticipating with confidence of fulfillment
= synonyms: expectation
